title: Invitation, Bob McGowan's 50th Birthday Celebration, 1993
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, across upper right quadrant: ed fella  :Desig'n LETTERING
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper left quadrant: YOU ARE INVITED/ To/ BOB/ MCGOWAN'S; upper right quadrant, running downward: 50th BIRTHDAY; across upper center: CELEBRATION; across center: WE'LL PARTY/ AT Bittersweet Farms/ 'TILL/ THE/ COWS COME HOME.; across center, right: 7:30 p.m./ on/ Monday/ December/ 27/ 1993; across center, left: WE'LL/ REMINISCE/ 'TIL THEY/ CAN'T; across lower right quadrant: STAND IT ANY/ MORE/ *& TAKE OFF/ OR/ GREENER/ PASTURES.*/ across lower edge: BARNYARD BOOGEY R.S.V.P. (313) 620-0123
Verso: Imprinted in black across upper left quadrant: Party Theme:/ Fiftieth birthday/ Bittersweet Farm/ damn,/ you and your vernacular/ have me seeing/ Chew Mail Pouch/ signs on my barn; across center, left: prefer a theme/ like/ Bittersweet/ darm for 'em/ or/ farm fourM/ music/ muses/ magic/ (your own M word here)/ MALARKEY/ family, friends/ a good harvest/ BitterSweet McGowen Farm/ 8551 ALLEN ROAD/ CLARKSTON, MICHIGAN/ ZIP: 48348/ 48348/ OR/ OR/ OR/ 48348

*&... PASTURES is crossed out
description:
Poster invitation to Bob McGowan's birthday party printed in black.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout. 
Recto: Across sheet, [printed] scrawled text and more formal text throughout, giving event, time, date, location, contact, and additional information.  
Verso: Across sheet, text giving theme, address, addtional information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation, Bob McGowan's 50th Birthday Celebration, 1993. Offset lithograph on tan paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-4
